story_galar_01_03000/2401_1001_0100_10:
It’s a shame that Leon and Sonia are too busy to
join us...
story_galar_01_03000/2401_1001_0400_10: That’s...Allister, isn’t it? What was that move?
story_galar_01_03000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I think I saw something shine before they used
those moves...
story_galar_01_03000/2401_1001_0900_10:
The sync stone converts the bond of a sync pair
into power.
story_galar_01_03000/2401_1001_1100_10:
A sync stone, you say... It must hold a lot
of energy!
story_galar_01_03000/2401_1001_1200_10:
I’m sure spectators would be thrilled to see a
flashy battle like this.
story_galar_01_03000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Could you tell me who on Pasio knows the most
about sync stones?
story_galar_01_03000/2401_1001_1500_10: If you can give me a name, I’d love to meet them!
